author: JanGerritSchulz
body:
#### PR description:

This PR upgrades the existing class of `SimDoublets` to a more extensive class of `SimPixelTracks`. This allows for a more detailed analysis of the Patatrack pixel tracking performance by providing additional simulation truth for more intermediate objects in Patatrack. This includes triplets and N-tuplets and their respective cuts applied when built in reconstruction.

This PR is currently a draft and not ready for review. More detailed information will follow...
